p: Specific pathogen-free male C57BL/6 mice (8 weeks, 20–22 g) were purchased from Orient Bio, Inc. (Seoul, Korea), were maintained and housed in standard cages and exposed to a 12:12 hour light/dark cycle (7 AM:7 PM) at room temperature (25 °C) with food and water ad libitum in a specific-pathogen-free facility. The animals were used after a one-week period of quarantine and acclimatization. All experimental protocols in this study were approved by the Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee of Chonnam National University (CNU IACUC-YB-2018-69, 1 August 2018), and the animals were cared for in accordance with the NIH Guide for the Care and Use of Laboratory Animals.
